html:
1.19.21  4:45 pm   Wait what's steve's actual name if his name isn't steve?

      your name

1.19.21  4:35 pm   do you like *insert obscure thing here*?

      yes i find it relatable

1.19.21  4:35 pm   im starting to think either all art is good or no art is good. and im not sure which answer is correct....

      all art is both

1.19.21  4:01 pm   Where was the weirdest place you came up with a song idea?

      on earth

1.19.21  3:04 pm   will you continue to do non-music videos as well as music videos?

     oh hell yeah

     ones like "ball and stick" and "maybe i could eat blades of grass" are some of my favorite vids of yours

1.19.21  3:03 pm   has a question asked here or a comment on one of your platforms ever heavily influenced/inspired your work?

      yes. someone said that they thought history of japan was the only history video i was gonna make

1.19.21  3:02 pm   What gives the idea for the lyrics?

      the normal, ordinary world

1.19.21  2:55 pm   Are you sarcastic in general?

      no

1.19.21  2:54 pm   I noticed that there's a common theme of travelling in some of your songs. (ex: outside, and the day goes on, at the airport terminal, long long journey, etc) Is there a reason for that, or do you just really like travelling?

      yes but i also like staying still

1.19.21  2:16 pm   How do you think of making such great art? :?

      just trying to get by

1.19.21  1:10 pm   have you considered doing stop motion with cut up bits of paper

      yes

1.19.21  12:59 pm   Are u planning on branching to VR stuff next

      not next, but later

1.19.21  12:59 pm   you predicted 2020 back in 2018. are you able to foresee the future?

      yes, with the help of calendars

1.19.21  12:44 pm   What made you make here comes the sun?

     songs are one of my preferred forms of expression. videos are another form of expression i like. put them together and you've got the best of both worlds

      Was it for fun or is there a deeper meaning to it.

     deeper, although fun is also pretty deep in and of itself

1.19.21  12:25 pm   Really high quality video! How do you keep the high standard? How to refine one's taste to self-judge? 

      it goes the other way. i have to keep the standard as low as possible because it keeps getting higher without me noticing which is devastating mostly for the release date

1.19.21  12:25 pm   what is the weirdest time signature you can write a song in?

      as weird as you want, but it can be even weirder if there's no time signature

1.19.21  12:19 pm   Did you purposefully set Inauguration Day as your deadline to post a new video?

      absolutely not. the deadline was october 6

1.19.21  12:14 pm   what is your favorite song / video you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.19.21  12:07 pm   Congrats on the new song 'here comes the sun' I have been trying to get into playing keyboard and writing music, any tips to help with that

      start by just writing 1 note. or 1 word. or something else of quantity 1

1.19.21  11:57 am   do you ever work on more than one song at once?

     no

     also, do you have any tips on how to stay focused and productive when multitasking?

     no

1.19.21  11:40 am   in your "might quit" video you said you're going somewhere else instead, where did you go?

      i thought that story was about you

1.19.21  11:40 am   Would you use any backing tracks in a potential live setting?

      people, not tracks

1.19.21  11:30 am   who is your favorite character in the bill wurtz cinematic universe? 

      could be you

1.19.21  11:26 am   do you have multiple projects going on at a time or do you work on them 1 by 1, waiting until you've finished one to start the next?

      usually 1 at a time

1.19.21  11:19 am   What did you do after uploading the new song?

      continue working on the video for the next one

1.19.21  11:09 am   What is your fascination with the sun?

      it's kind of the power source for our entire lives

1.19.21  11:04 am   Was your last song called "might quit" as a coincidence or was it a deliberate joke, knowing you wouldn't upload for a long time?

      that's a coincidence. i didn't know that was going to happen until pretty far into the next one, which was never finished

1.19.21  11:01 am   How would you describe yourself?

      i would probably make a website

1.19.21  10:40 am   what's the funniest joke you've heard

      the truth

1.19.21  10:31 am   Sorry if you've gotten this question before but what is your process for making your music videos? 

      we'll see

1.19.21  10:12 am   About how long does it take to create a song

     any amount of time really

     and how do you pick chord progressions, keys, tempos, etc.

      whatever the melody/lyric asks for

1.19.21  10:11 am   i feel like this isnt really contributing to this pages appeal but i have to do a school report on a famous person and i chose you anything that would be useful to know?

      i'm a person

1.19.21  10:06 am   can you make a twitter account?

      sure

1.19.21  10:05 am   What was your inspiration to make videos with a ton of editing?

      got to be some mistake. must be some huge huge mistake here. i'll let you know soon

1.19.21  9:48 am   what is your mbti type?

      regular

1.19.21  9:38 am   When you were answering questions about a big project, what did you mean?

     what big project

     Project like the new art style (which I love) or do you mean something like History of the entire world?

      i never said i was doing a big project. a lot of times people tell me i am, (actually you just did) and then i have to try to figure out what they mean

1.19.21  9:22 am   Are there other creative ventures outside of your norm that you want to explore?

     yes

     What are they? 

     fictional non-song videos with multiple characters

1.19.21  8:51 am   Can you improvise on giant steps? 

      sure but how bout at a tempo where the chords actually have time to be effective

1.19.21  8:48 am   Which of your songs is your favorite

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.19.21  8:02 am   have you ever considered writing your songs on mars?

      no but i have considered making them take place on mars

1.19.21  7:43 am   What was your inspiration for "here comes the sun"?

      the sun

1.19.21  7:06 am   was "might quit" a song that said that u are going to learn 3d?

      no

1.19.21  7:02 am   the way you speak makes me thing you could never pass the Turing test but I don't mean it as an insult

      i can shred the turing test. i will do speed runs of the turing test

1.19.21  7:00 am   I'm in the middle of a music test, quick, what does a piano do?

      chords, maybe more if necessary

1.19.21  6:53 am   how do you decide what key your song is in?

      what key i can sing it best in. unless it's the exact same key as the previous song, in which case i might change it a half step

1.19.21  6:38 am   Croissant or instant noodle 

      how about ..... instant croissant

1.19.21  6:00 am   How do you answer questions with such complexity and simplicity in just a few words?

      usually i just delete the second half

1.19.21  5:57 am   when you answered a question on 1.15.21 at 11:36 pm, were you lying?

      no

1.19.21  5:51 am   What course did you take in uni?

      none

1.19.21  5:45 am   Why did you make a new video

      videos are one of my prefered forms of expression
